lead_paragraph: Christina Kim shot a nine-under-par 63 Thursday to take a one-stroke lead at the State Farm Classic in Springfield, Ill. Kim who has two career wins and 30 top-10 finishes, had seven birdies and an eagle, and no bogeys. There were many low scores, including a 67 from Michelle Wie that was her best of the year. Wie was playing on a sponsor’s exemption. The South Korean Sun Young Yoo finished a stroke behind Kim at 64.
